actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Cohen favorably with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 97-296.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 412.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to disburse certain trust funds of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior or Chippewa Indians of Wisconsin, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Indian Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 97-296) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to disburse certain trust funds of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians of Wisconsin. Requires that such disbursement be used to cover or reduce a bank overdraft incurred by the tribe in support of administration of Federal contracts. Authorizes the Secretary to reimburse the tribe, if the United States adjusts the accounts of Indian tribes or organizations administering Federal contracts, for the overrecovery or underrecovery of indirect costs.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to disburse certain trust funds of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior or Chippewa Indians of Wisconsin, and for other purposes.
